doc.title: Abenteuer Alpencross 2 - Transalp auf der Albrecht-Route
doc.plot: One of the most popular alpine crossings is Andreas Albrecht's route from Garmisch-Partenkirchen in Bavaria to Lake Garda in Italy. By now, thousands of bikers have followed this route. You can discover awesome mountain passes, lonely valleys, fabulous single tracks, romantic cottages and a lot of ridable trails. In brief: The Albrecht-Route with all its variations has become a classic. The film shows the most recent and most superb variant of the tour across the Fimberpass, Pass da Costainas, Val Mora, Passo Verva, Passo dell' Alpe, Montozzo Scharte and Val d'Agola.
